attributes.action: Radically reform the electoral system of the United Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is long overdue that our electoral system should more truly relate to the votes that are cast. 
Please support the philosophy of proportional representation so that the views of the electorate are actually represented.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
